Reviews.Content: Budget Hotel, close to Tian Anmen and Forbidden city We stayed in this hotel on November 2 to 7, 2007. The location is just a few minutes walking distance from the forbidden city and Tian Anmen square and also close to a good restaurant. This hotel also provides a booking services for a tour or a plane tickets very easily. Very few staffs speak english.
Reviews.Author: Nald
